auditeerbare data voorziening die flexibel kan reageren op de continue veranderende behoefte van klanten  Er wordt hierbij gewerkt met een model gedreven aanpak die ondersteund wordt door een uniek  zelf ontworpen product  Om de markt te kunnen benaderen die voor ons openligt  groeien we hard  Heel hard  Daarom zijn er consultants nodig  Functieomschrijving Als consultant ben je vooral heel nieuwsgierig  analytisch sterk en los je graag complexe problemen op  Om er een metafoor aan te koppelen  wij zijn op zoek naar mensen die graag de ingrediënten verzamelen  ordenen  classificeren en beschikbaar te stellen  Voor een kwaliteitsmaaltijd is de voorbereiding van de ingrediënten een cruciale stap  Onze focus ligt niet direct op techniek  maar zonder techniek zal de complexiteit voor onze klanten niet opgelost kunnen worden  Wij vinden balans in het modelleren van data en het technisch integreren van onze oplossing in het IT landschap van de betreffende klant   Het werk bestaat uit het inventariseren van klantbehoeften  het polsen waar het probleem zit en wat er opgelost moet worden  en bepalen hoe dit opgelost kan worden  Dit om zoveel mogelijk informatie naar boven te Vattenfall is one of Europe s largest electricity generators and producer of heat and operates in Sweden  Denmark  Germany  the Netherlands and the UK  Our strategy is to Power Climate Smarter Living with an ambition to enable fossil free living within one generation  We are now looking for the right person to fill the position as Data Scientist   Grid Flexibility Services  within Business Area Wind  Offshore  Engineering  The Engineering department is the technical know how centre within Business Area Wind  setting the standards and guidelines as well as being embedded within our projects  both through the development and implementation phase as well as in operations  Working within Digital Integration  part of Systems Engineering  in the Analytics team  the Data Scientist is to develop analytics models to support the operations and enable data driven decision making  Main tasks   responsibilities  As part of the Analytics Team you will work on development of our analytics capabilities  processes and tools enabling data driven business decisions  Your primarily role will be to support development of our grid service products for offshore wind assets optimising the business case for different markets  Your contribution to the team will be to develop the technical and financial model that shows how the solution will work for a specific wind farm in a specific geographical market   You will collaborate closely with the other Engineers in Engineering to ensure that the analytics developed is done with the best application of domain knowledge  You support in instilling an innovative and entrepreneurial environment while balancing the risk associated Work on assigned analytics products and features primarily for Grid Flexibility services  This includes developing the backend of flexibility services engine  responsible for controlling the test and release versions of the engine  responsible for interface and code consistency  Support the process   tools maturation and application in the business  Engage in complex and high priority assignments in product development  project delivery or operational assets  Produce and review key technology documents  Identifying development opportunities including business impact  Your Profile as Data Scientist   Grid Flexibility Services may include  You have experience with Python  Other programming languages will be a plus  You have experience with CI CD pipelines You have the ability to look at developments from both technical and financial perspective  You command English in both verbal and written form  You are used to work in multi disciplinary teams  and you enjoy explaining technical solutions also to people outside your own area of expertise  You have proven skills in dealing with problems and challenges and can transfer technical and or project challenges into solutions  Location The location of this position is in one of our offices in Hamburg  Kolding or Amsterdam  Some travel is to be expected  Process and timeline We welcome your application in English  including CV and cover letter via the application button at this page  Last day to apply will be April 24  2022  and the interview process starts as soon as the applications are received  For more information about the position  you are welcome to contact Manager of Data Analytics in BA Wind  Adel Haghani   49 1621 655070  For more information about the recruitment process  you are welcome to contact our Recruiter Anica Zerfuss  49 40 790220 2141   Our organisation Energy is our contribution to quality of life   day after day  With around 20 000 colleagues Vattenfall provides comprehensive electricity and heating offerings to several million customers in northern Europe  For the work ahead we need people who are fully dedicated to our customers and to a sustainable society   people like you   Business Area Wind is responsible for Vattenfall s Onshore and Offshore Wind as well as other non hydro Renewable activities like solar PV and batteries  Today we develop  construct and operate wind generation in Sweden  Denmark  Germany  the Netherlands and the UK  In addition  we have a clear strategy to develop our solar PV and battery operations further   At Vattenfall we are convinced that diversity contributes to build a more profitable and attractive company and we strive to be good role model regarding diversity  Vattenfall works actively for all employees to have the same opportunities and rights regardless of gender  ethnicity  age  transgender identity or expression  religion or other belief  disability or sexual orientation

Data Scientist Credit Risk IFRS9 Imagine  having an impact on all the models that affect all of our clients  As a Data Scientist in IFRS9 monitoring team  you will in particular be analysing IFRS9 models and data across all portfolios of Rabobank  You ll have a hand in monitoring the IFRS9 provisions and the model components  PD  EAD  LGD  etc    developing monitoring methodology and presenting your results to stakeholders  Making a difference Implement and perform quantitative tests to monitor the IFRS9 models performance in Python Interpret and translate the results of quantitative analyses to understandable reports Develop and improve methodologies for testing the performance of the IFRS9 models Practice your skills in communication and presentation by effectively sharing your observations with stakeholders  which in turn improves their work Prove the added value of model monitoring by identifying flaws at the earliest possible moment Have the opportunity to act as project manager and bring monitoring projects to a successful completion With each other Collaboration is at the heart of everything we do  Our Credit Strategic Model Unit  CSMU  team brings diverse and talented people together to monitor and backtest the most important models of Rabobank  such as IFRS9  A IRB and valuation models  Your experience with IFRS9 modelling validation will be your guide as you analyse the performance of a variety of models and ensure that they meet ever changing market and regulatory requirements  As a Data Scientist IFRS9  you will practice intelligent ways of analysis with your CSMU team colleagues and dealing with stakeholders such as model validation and model developers  Fatemeh  Team Lead IFRS9 Monitoring   Backtesting    Working in CSMU is a great opportunity to see many credit risk models of the bank including all IFRS9 portfolios and contribute to strengthen the performance of these models  Besides being part of a talented team of data scientists  we work closely with broad range of stakeholders in the data team  model development  validation  business and audit    Jeroen  Advanced Analytics Young Professional   For me CSMU has been a great starting point in getting to know the bank  In CSMU we work together with many other teams and face a wide variety of challenges  And because we focus on three aspects of credit models  strategy  methodology   backtesting  there is always plenty to learn   With you If we were to ask your friends to describe you in a few key words  the answer would be  customer focused  pro active  accommodating  positive  empathetic and eager to learn  For the position of Data Scientist IFRS9  you should also have  A Master s or PhD in an exact science  econometrics  mathematics  physics  engineering  astronomy or similar  1 3 years of experience in modelling  monitoring or validation of IFRS9 models Programming experience in Python  SQL  GIT or similar Practical experience with regulatory requirements  IFRS9  LGD  PD  Fluency in English  both in writing and in oral communication Experience in project management and organisation or Agile way of working Knowledge about A IRB models or Basel3 is a plus Growing a better world together Rabobank is a financial services provider for 8 5 million customers in 40 countries  But did you know that we are also working to make the world a better place  We do so in countless ways  such as  Supporting risk savvy models that ensure the right balance between business opportunities and appetite  to drive effective financial services  Growing better models together  which enables the right customers to get the right support at the right time to pursue their dreams  Ensuring that the models that are made  are made even better by your impact  Interested  Do you want to become the ideal version of yourself  We would love to help you achieve this by focusing firmly on your growth  development  and investing in an environment where you keep learning every day  We give you the space to innovate and initiate  In this way  we offer you numerous opportunities to grow and help you exceed your expectations  to do the right thing Bestuursbureau in Heerenveen  voor 20 32 uur  op zoek naar een enthousiaste en ervaren  Kwaliteitsfunctionaris   Data Specialist Waar ga je werken  Zorggroep Alliade is er voor mensen die moeite hebben om zelfstandig te leven en zich staande te houden in de samenleving  Daarbij richten wij ons op kwetsbare ouderen en mensen met een verstandelijke beperking   Onze zorgonderdelen zijn deskundig in gehandicaptenzorg  ouderenzorg  dagbesteding  specialistische jeugdzorg  arbeidsre integratie en ouderenpsychiatrie  Je komt te werken op de afdeling Kwaliteit   Controle  Samen met een enthousiast en gedreven team van 7 collega s zijn we onze afdeling stevig op de kaart aan het zetten binnen de organisatie  Het team bestaat uit een diverse mix van functionarissen die allen vanuit een andere invalshoek bijdragen aan het  in control  zijn  Wij zijn zogezegd het  geweten  van de organisatie en toetsen met een onafhankelijke bril of de organisatie doet wat zij zegt  Dit doen wij onder meer door het verzamelen  bij elkaar brengen en analyseren van data  Ook toetsen wij bijvoorbeeld waar verbeterpunten voor de organisatie liggen  Hier maken we vervolgens verbetermaatregelen op met als gevolg dat de kwaliteit van zorg wordt vergroot  Een afdeling die dus volop in ontwikkeling is en een grote bijdrage levert aan de uiteindelijke kwaliteit van zorg  Wat ga je doen  Als kwaliteitsfunctionaris dataspecialist focus jij je met name op het verzamelen  bij elkaar brengen en analyseren van data  Jij kunt data vanuit verschillende bronsystemen aan elkaar koppelen  analyseren en hier conclusies uit trekken  Deze informatie weet jij vervolgens op heldere wijze te communiceren binnen de organisatie  Samen met collega s draag jij er op deze manier aan bij dat de organisatie 3D in control is  zorg HR Financiën   Verder is het ons gezamenlijk doel om sturing vanuit management systemen te implementeren  waarmee de PDCA  Plan Do Check Act  cirkel gaat rollen Bynder helps visionary brands like Spotify  PUMA  and Icelandair accelerate growth through the power of creative content and branding  Our software helps over 1 4 million creative  branding and marketing professionals streamlining the creation  distribution and measurement of digital assets  We pioneered the SaaS model for Digital Asset Management  which is a large and growing part of the  121 billion martech industry  Bynder is backed by Insight Partners  with offices in Amsterdam  Boston  Rotterdam  San Carlos  London  Barcelona and Dubai  The Information Governance Office is a new department within Bynder created under the CIO organization  The key concept of the Information Governance Office is to collaborate across the organization to manage the entire information flow for Bynder  including the integrity  efficiency  and availability of data   As a Data Governance Analyst  you develop and implement data standards  guarantee that metadata is captured correctly  and create methods for monitoring and reporting data  You support applications and personnel to ensure they are following data governance procedures  You may also help create and maintain common data dictionaries and tools or methods that support data standards   In this role  you also analyze and oversee strategies designed to enhance data reliability and minimize redundancies  You collaborate with other information technology colleagues to develop data quality standards and create key performance indicators and supply colleagues and organizational management with performance results   You will work alongside your colleagues within Information Technology  report into the Information Governance Manager and collaborate with data stakeholders across the company to encourage a data culture and promote data driven decisions   Responsibilities Responsible for the data governance framework and dashboards  Develop control structures within a simple environment to ensure the accuracy and quality of data through all upstream and downstream data channels  Initiate cross domain data projects and collaborate with the data team and business units to improve the data governance framework  Provide thought leadership and participate in projects that involve any of the upstream or downstream data flows and processes  Ensure data integrity by performing data integrity gap analysis  Coordinate the resolution of data integrity gaps by working with the business owners and IT  Work with business partners to gather and understand functional requirements  develop queries and improve reporting   Skills Strong understanding of databases and data structures  Strong analytical and time management skills  Strong written and verbal communication skills  Intermediate facilitation skills with the ability to drive issues to closure  Self motivated and able to handle tasks with minimal supervision  Ability to write various documents such as functional requirements  Ability to compare technologies and make recommendations  Basic level knowledge in Structured Query Language  SQL   An employee who fits Bynder values Strong organizational skills Strong stakeholder management skills Understanding of AWS Data Lake Understanding of Data analytics  dashboards  and KPI Reporting

job_desc: Data analyst planning and forecasting As Data analyst planning and forecasting you help companies make better forecasting  planning and inventory management decisions  based on quantitative analysis and models  You are a creative mind with a passion for planning  both the technology and the reality of business  You are keen to translate data science outcomes into business impact   Your role as Data analyst planning and forecasting  In your work  you deal with the three pillars of applied analytics  data engineering  model development and storytelling  You keep a sharp analytical eye on both the business challenges and the hard data science   Your activities are a mix between shorter customer projects  4 6 weeks   internal developments  and longer  interim  activities  3 6 months  at selected customers  This provides unique opportunities to learn about and work with the latest data science insights around forecasting  inventory management  and other aspects of planning  as well as great experiences being immersed in the reality of business   At EyeOn you will work with the latest techniques  solutions and insights in the field of planning and forecasting  As believers in the future where data is the core and most decisions are made by machines  we are constantly developing ourselves and the techniques and methods we work with  We challenge you to do the same   Your primary work location will be at our customer locations and our office in Aarle Rixtel  where our forecasting   planning knowledge center is located  We also have offices in Amsterdam  Antwerp  Geneva  Zürich  Dublin  Düsseldorf  and New York City   Responsibilities Translating planning challenges into data science solutions  In interim projects  helping customers with their challenges in any way needed  creating ad hoc analyses  providing insightful dashboards  developing their in house data science knowledge  etc  Contribute to the innovative power of EyeOn by running applied analytics lab projects  Raising the expertise of EyeOn colleagues in the area of applied analytics  Preferred requirements A completed university education and master degree in operations research  data science  econometrics  mathematics or similar  Relevant experience in or affinity with supply chain planning and forecasting processes  You enjoy translating complex practical problems into mathematical models  Experience with programming  preferably in Python  Numpy  Pandas  Scipy  Scikit learn   Experience with processing and analyzing data  eg  SQL  Hadoop  Spark  Kubernetes  is a plus  Knowledge of  and experience with typical data science techniques  eg  time series  regression  classification  clustering  math programming  simulation  etc  EU working permit  Working location  Eindhoven  EyeOn Data Science  In EyeOn Data Science we re the best at helping our customers do better supply chain planning through data science  We make sure we stay the best by working together as a team  and by learning new things from each other and through our customer projects   We re a young team with a passion for data science  using tools such as Dataiku  Python  pandas  numpy   Spark  PowerBI  Tableau  Jira  Bitbucket  and more  We are creative minds with a fascination for data  We believe in the digital transformation and a data driven future  Why work for EyeOn  Join a global team with experienced experts who are passionate about supply chain planning and data science  Co create solutions with creativity and innovation to solve tough business challenges for some of the world s largest and most successful companies  Work in a culture that blends the best entrepreneurial spirit with a healthy work life balance  Experience the freedom of deciding how you schedule your agenda  work and location in teams that operate with trust and autonomy  Create your own personal development program with the counsel of our experienced experts and support from EyeOn  Receive excellent employee benefits and perks  including bonus potential  Answers to your questions  Inge Loog is available to answer any questions you may have about this role  Contact Inge at inge loog eyeon nl  An individual assessment is part of our selection procedure

Do you love to work with a highly skilled  enthusiastic and international team of data scientists  Are you keen about developing team members and the team  Are you just as passionate about creating more knowledge from data as we are  We have a vacancy for a team leader to lead the Data Science Team  16 fte  at Wageningen Food Safety Research  WFSR  WE ARE LOOKING FOR The use of data science is crucial to improve the safety of our food and feed  Within WFSR we have created a new data science team combining a broad range of skills and knowhow to apply data science in the domain of food safety  As team manager of the data science team  you are responsible for  developing  the team and the team members and also for the research and projects carried out by the team  The team leader  is part of the management team of the business unit and you contribute to the development and implementation of the strategic plans of the business unit with your colleague team leaders  is responsible for HR tasks such as implementing HR policy  absenteeism supervision  training and development plan  etc  is responsible for monitoring the scientific and technical quality of the research  builds and maintains valuable relationships with other teams  experts  research institutes  food authorities  and companies  acts as a motivated ambassador for data science and the WFSR data science team   within WFSR  WUR and beyond and by doing so acquires projects for the team  ensures that the projects placed within the data science team are implemented WFSR wide where necessary meaningful and plans the capacity of the team members in the projects  In our projects we use machine learning and artificial intelligence  bioinformatics   big  data analytics  programming  image processing  and data visualisation  For example  we develop emerging risk identification systems to identify  un known hazards in the food supply chain  We have used artificial intelligence technologies for the identification of chemicals that may be used in food supplements that were not known to us yet  We develop bioinformatics methods to improve the discovery and characterization of microbial pathogens in the food chain  The global food system faces many challenges with the changing climate  the need for sustainability  the changing societal demands  and the vulnerability of the integrity of the food system   Wageningen University   Research offers excellent terms of employment  A few highlights from our Collective Labour Agreement include  working hours that can be discussed and arranged so that they allow for the best possible work life balance  the option to accrue additional compensation hours by working more  up to 40 hours per week  sabbatical leave  study leave  and partially paid parental leave  there is a strong focus on vitality and you can make use of the sports facilities available on campus for a small fee  a fixed December bonus of 4    excellent pension scheme  In addition to these first rate employee benefits  you will of course receive a good salary  We offer  depending on your experience  a competitive gross salary of between   4 465   and   6 710   for a full time working week of 36 hours  in accordance with the CLA Wageningen Research  scale 13   Wageningen University   Research encourages internal advancement opportunities and mobility with an internal recruitment policy  There are plenty of options for personal initiative in a learning environment  and we provide excellent training opportunities  We are offering a multi faceted position in an international environment with a pleasant and open working atmosphere  You are going to work at the greenest and most innovative campus in The Netherlands  and at a university that has been chosen as the  Best University  in the Netherlands for the 16th consecutive time Coming from abroad Wageningen University   Research is the university and research centre for life sciences  The themes we deal with are relevant to everyone around the world and Wageningen  therefore  has a large international community and a lot to offer to international employees  Applicants from abroad moving to the Netherlands may qualify for a special tax relief  known as the 30  ruling  Our team of advisors on Dutch immigration procedures will help you with the visa application procedures for yourself and  if applicable  for your family  Feeling welcome also has everything to do with being well informed  Wageningen University   Research s International Community page contains practical information about what we can do to support international employees and students coming to Wageningen  Furthermore  we can assist you with any additional advice and information about helping your partner to find a job  housing  schooling  and other issues   Wageningen University   Research The mission of Wageningen University and Research is  To explore the potential of nature to improve the quality of life   Under the banner Wageningen University   Research  Wageningen University and the specialised research institutes of the Wageningen Research Foundation have joined forces in contributing to finding solutions to important questions in the domain of healthy food and living environment  With its roughly 30 branches  6 800 employees and 12 900 students  Wageningen University   Research is one of the leading organisations in its domain  An integrated approach to problems and the cooperation between various disciplines are at the heart of Wageningen s unique approach  WUR has been named Best Employer in Disclaimer  You must already be living in or around the area of Amsterdam in order to be eligible for this position  Are you a starter or junior specialist looking for a serious opportunity to give your career a phenomenal kickstart  Would you like to be a part of one of the Big 4 in consulting that houses some of the smartest and most capable specialist on the market that you can learn from  How about working on the development of machine learning for one of the most prominent social media platforms  counting well over 300 Million active users per day  And do you have affinity with the creative aspect of digital marketing like image editing and creating content collections  If yes  then this opportunity might be the one for you  Read on   Your new employer  One of the Big 4 in consulting  literal world leaders in their field  working of the exclusive project to boost the capabilities of one of the most well know Social Media platforms   Location  Amsterdam  So lets start at the employer itself  one of the Big 4 in consulting  The big 4 in consulting have pretty much defined the industry and the way of working throughout countless aspects of commercial businesses  The work for clients such as Coca Cola  The World Wildlife Fund  Takeaway and just about any globally recognized brand you dare to name   To be able to work with world leading companies such as these you need to come from a world leading calibre yourself  which is exactly what the Big 4 are  They house some of the smartest and most capable people in the market to tackle these daunting challenges  which means that in terms of professional development there is no better supplier out there   And should you get to the point where you would search for your next career opportunity after having worked here  then your track record and experience that you ll have gained here will almost automatically earn you a massive advantage over the competition  So if you are looking to earn yourself a serious boost in professional development and an exceptional kickstart to your professional career  then this is the place to do it   Your new job  The data labelling specialist that will work on developing the machine learning capabilities for one of the most prominent social media platforms on the planet  counting well over 300 Million active users per day   Given the fact that social media is pretty much an inseparable element of our modern day society I probably don t need to explain the massive reach and impact you can have  This particular platform has a heavy focus on creative content and the platform aims to deliver the most relevant and interesting content to its users every day   In order to do this they are making heavy use of an algorithm that is able to recognise specific types of content  to provide this to people who have shown an interest in a particular subject  based on their interactive behaviour on the platform  In order to do this however  this algorithm has to learn and know what it is that it s looking at  which is where you and machine learning come in   Although algorithms and machine learning sound quite technical  there is no actual IT and development work involved for you  This is about  like the title suggests  data labelling  A process where you will review visual content and label specific characteristics that make it stand out from other subjects or types of content  With enough prepared samples the algorithm will then have the necessary amount of comparable material to start recognising this subject on its own   Along the labelling aspect you will also create various collections of visual content and perform edits to the material itself  giving the job more of a focus on photoshop and visual creative content than anything else  These activities will then further help the development of the machine learning algorithm to be able to supply the relevant content the users are looking for on their platform  day after day   What do we need from you   As the new Data Labelling Specialist that will work as part of the Big 4 in consulting for one of the most prominent Social Media platforms on the planet  Location  Amsterdam   we need the following from you  Experience with any sort of image editing software  such as Photoshop No prior fulltime working experience required Strong communicative capabilities are required You are currently living near the area of Amsterdam What will you get in return  Salary between  2 450 and  2 600 per month A  1 500 sign on bonus  Excellent career development opportunities Is this going to be your next job   Take the step and let us hear from you  Apply immediately via the application button below  send your CV and motivation to m vanrosmalen hotmail com or give us a call at  31 20 8200 676   For all of our other vacancies regarding Digital Marketing in Amsterdam  be sure to check out our website  https   www finestpeople nl en jobs

Bynder helps visionary brands like Spotify  PUMA  and Icelandair accelerate growth through the power of creative content and branding  Our software helps over 1 4 million creative  branding and marketing professionals streamlining the creation  distribution and measurement of digital assets  We pioneered the SaaS model for Digital Asset Management  which is a large and growing part of the  121 billion martech industry  Bynder is backed by Insight Partners  with offices in Amsterdam  Boston  Rotterdam  San Carlos  London  Barcelona and Dubai  The Information Governance Office is a new department within Bynder created under the CIO organization  The key concept of the Information Governance Office is to collaborate across the organization to manage the entire information flow for Bynder  including the integrity  efficiency  and availability of data   As a Data Governance Analyst  you develop and implement data standards  guarantee that metadata is captured correctly  and create methods for monitoring and reporting data  You support applications and personnel to ensure they are following data governance procedures  You may also help create and maintain common data dictionaries and tools or methods that support data standards   In this role  you also analyze and oversee strategies designed to enhance data reliability and minimize redundancies  You collaborate with other information technology colleagues to develop data quality standards and create key performance indicators and supply colleagues and organizational management with performance results   You will work alongside your colleagues within Information Technology  report into the Information Governance Manager and collaborate with data stakeholders across the company to encourage a data culture and promote data driven decisions   Responsibilities Responsible for the data governance framework and dashboards  Develop control structures within a simple environment to ensure the accuracy and quality of data through all upstream and downstream data channels  Initiate cross domain data projects and collaborate with the data team and business units to improve the data governance framework  Provide thought leadership and participate in projects that involve any of the upstream or downstream data flows and processes  Ensure data integrity by performing data integrity gap analysis  Coordinate the resolution of data integrity gaps by working with the business owners and IT  Work with business partners to gather and understand functional requirements  develop queries and improve reporting   Skills Strong understanding of databases and data structures  Strong analytical and time management skills  Strong written and verbal communication skills  Intermediate facilitation skills with the ability to drive issues to closure  Self motivated and able to handle tasks with minimal supervision  Ability to write various documents such as functional requirements  Ability to compare technologies and make recommendations  Basic level knowledge in Structured Query Language  SQL   An employee who fits Bynder values Strong organizational skills Strong stakeholder management skills Understanding of AWS Data Lake Understanding of Data analytics  dashboards  and KPI Reporting

job_desc: Data analyst planning and forecasting As Data analyst planning and forecasting you help companies make better forecasting  planning and inventory management decisions  based on quantitative analysis and models  You are a creative mind with a passion for planning  both the technology and the reality of business  You are keen to translate data science outcomes into business impact   Your role as Data analyst planning and forecasting  In your work  you deal with the three pillars of applied analytics  data engineering  model development and storytelling  You keep a sharp analytical eye on both the business challenges and the hard data science   Your activities are a mix between shorter customer projects  4 6 weeks   internal developments  and longer  interim  activities  3 6 months  at selected customers  This provides unique opportunities to learn about and work with the latest data science insights around forecasting  inventory management  and other aspects of planning  as well as great experiences being immersed in the reality of business   At EyeOn you will work with the latest techniques  solutions and insights in the field of planning and forecasting  As believers in the future where data is the core and most decisions are made by machines  we are constantly developing ourselves and the techniques and methods we work with  We challenge you to do the same   Your primary work location will be at our customer locations and our office in Aarle Rixtel  where our forecasting   planning knowledge center is located  We also have offices in Amsterdam  Antwerp  Geneva  Zürich  Dublin  Düsseldorf  and New York City   Responsibilities Translating planning challenges into data science solutions  In interim projects  helping customers with their challenges in any way needed  creating ad hoc analyses  providing insightful dashboards  developing their in house data science knowledge  etc  Contribute to the innovative power of EyeOn by running applied analytics lab projects  Raising the expertise of EyeOn colleagues in the area of applied analytics  Preferred requirements A completed university education and master degree in operations research  data science  econometrics  mathematics or similar  Relevant experience in or affinity with supply chain planning and forecasting processes  You enjoy translating complex practical problems into mathematical models  Experience with programming  preferably in Python  Numpy  Pandas  Scipy  Scikit learn   Experience with processing and analyzing data  eg  SQL  Hadoop  Spark  Kubernetes  is a plus  Knowledge of  and experience with typical data science techniques  eg  time series  regression  classification  clustering  math programming  simulation  etc  EU working permit  Working location  Eindhoven  EyeOn Data Science  In EyeOn Data Science we re the best at helping our customers do better supply chain planning through data science  We make sure we stay the best by working together as a team  and by learning new things from each other and through our customer projects   We re a young team with a passion for data science  using tools such as Dataiku  Python  pandas  numpy   Spark  PowerBI  Tableau  Jira  Bitbucket  and more  We are creative minds with a fascination for data  We believe in the digital transformation and a data driven future  Why work for EyeOn  Join a global team with experienced experts who are passionate about supply chain planning and data science  Co create solutions with creativity and innovation to solve tough business challenges for some of the world s largest and most successful companies  Work in a culture that blends the best entrepreneurial spirit with a healthy work life balance  Experience the freedom of deciding how you schedule your agenda  work and location in teams that operate with trust and autonomy  Create your own personal development program with the counsel of our experienced experts and support from EyeOn  Receive excellent employee benefits and perks  including bonus potential  Answers to your questions  Inge Loog is available to answer any questions you may have about this role  Contact Inge at inge loog eyeon nl  An individual assessment is part of our selection procedure

Do you love to work with a highly skilled  enthusiastic and international team of data scientists  Are you keen about developing team members and the team  Are you just as passionate about creating more knowledge from data as we are  We have a vacancy for a team leader to lead the Data Science Team  16 fte  at Wageningen Food Safety Research  WFSR  WE ARE LOOKING FOR The use of data science is crucial to improve the safety of our food and feed  Within WFSR we have created a new data science team combining a broad range of skills and knowhow to apply data science in the domain of food safety  As team manager of the data science team  you are responsible for  developing  the team and the team members and also for the research and projects carried out by the team  The team leader  is part of the management team of the business unit and you contribute to the development and implementation of the strategic plans of the business unit with your colleague team leaders  is responsible for HR tasks such as implementing HR policy  absenteeism supervision  training and development plan  etc  is responsible for monitoring the scientific and technical quality of the research  builds and maintains valuable relationships with other teams  experts  research institutes  food authorities  and companies  acts as a motivated ambassador for data science and the WFSR data science team   within WFSR  WUR and beyond and by doing so acquires projects for the team  ensures that the projects placed within the data science team are implemented WFSR wide where necessary meaningful and plans the capacity of the team members in the projects  In our projects we use machine learning and artificial intelligence  bioinformatics   big  data analytics  programming  image processing  and data visualisation  For example  we develop emerging risk identification systems to identify  un known hazards in the food supply chain  We have used artificial intelligence technologies for the identification of chemicals that may be used in food supplements that were not known to us yet  We develop bioinformatics methods to improve the discovery and characterization of microbial pathogens in the food chain  The global food system faces many challenges with the changing climate  the need for sustainability  the changing societal demands  and the vulnerability of the integrity of the food system   Wageningen University   Research offers excellent terms of employment  A few highlights from our Collective Labour Agreement include  working hours that can be discussed and arranged so that they allow for the best possible work life balance  the option to accrue additional compensation hours by working more  up to 40 hours per week  sabbatical leave  study leave  and partially paid parental leave  there is a strong focus on vitality and you can make use of the sports facilities available on campus for a small fee  a fixed December bonus of 4    excellent pension scheme  In addition to these first rate employee benefits  you will of course receive a good salary  We offer  depending on your experience  a competitive gross salary of between   4 465   and   6 710   for a full time working week of 36 hours  in accordance with the CLA Wageningen Research  scale 13   Wageningen University   Research encourages internal advancement opportunities and mobility with an internal recruitment policy  There are plenty of options for personal initiative in a learning environment  and we provide excellent training opportunities  We are offering a multi faceted position in an international environment with a pleasant and open working atmosphere  You are going to work at the greenest and most innovative campus in The Netherlands  and at a university that has been chosen as the  Best University  in the Netherlands for the 16th consecutive time Coming from abroad Wageningen University   Research is the university and research centre for life sciences  The themes we deal with are relevant to everyone around the world and Wageningen  therefore  has a large international community and a lot to offer to international employees  Applicants from abroad moving to the Netherlands may qualify for a special tax relief  known as the 30  ruling  Our team of advisors on Dutch immigration procedures will help you with the visa application procedures for yourself and  if applicable  for your family  Feeling welcome also has everything to do with being well informed  Wageningen University   Research s International Community page contains practical information about what we can do to support international employees and students coming to Wageningen  Furthermore  we can assist you with any additional advice and information about helping your partner to find a job  housing  schooling  and other issues   Wageningen University   Research The mission of Wageningen University and Research is  To explore the potential of nature to improve the quality of life   Under Disclaimer  You must already be living in or around the area of Amsterdam in order to be eligible for this position  Are you a starter or junior specialist looking for a serious opportunity to give your career a phenomenal kickstart  Would you like to be a part of one of the Big 4 in consulting that houses some of the smartest and most capable specialist on the market that you can learn from  How about working on the development of machine learning for one of the most prominent social media platforms  counting well over 300 Million active users per day  And do you have affinity with the creative aspect of digital marketing like image editing and creating content collections  If yes  then this opportunity might be the one for you  Read on   Your new employer  One of the Big 4 in consulting  literal world leaders in their field  working of the exclusive project to boost the capabilities of one of the most well know Social Media platforms   Location  Amsterdam  So lets start at the employer itself  one of the Big 4 in consulting  The big 4 in consulting have pretty much defined the industry and the way of working throughout countless aspects of commercial businesses  The work for clients such as Coca Cola  The World Wildlife Fund  Takeaway and just about any globally recognized brand you dare to name   To be able to work with world leading companies such as these you need to come from a world leading calibre yourself  which is exactly what the Big 4 are  They house some of the smartest and most capable people in the market to tackle these daunting challenges  which means that in terms of professional development there is no better supplier out there   And should you get to the point where you would search for your next career opportunity after having worked here  then your track record and experience that you ll have gained here will almost automatically earn you a massive advantage over the competition  So if you are looking to earn yourself a serious boost in professional development and an exceptional kickstart to your professional career  then this is the place to do it   Your new job  The data labelling specialist that will work on developing the machine learning capabilities for one of the most prominent social media platforms on the planet  counting well over 300 Million active users per day   Given the fact that social media is pretty much an inseparable element of our modern day society I probably don t need to explain the massive reach and impact you can have  This particular platform has a heavy focus on creative content and the platform aims to deliver the most relevant and interesting content to its users every day   In order to do this they are making heavy use of an algorithm that is able to recognise specific types of content  to provide this to people who have shown an interest in a particular subject  based on their interactive behaviour on the platform  In order to do this however  this algorithm has to learn and know what it is that it s looking at  which is where you and machine learning come in   Although algorithms and machine learning sound quite technical  there is no actual IT and development work involved for you  This is about  like the title suggests  data labelling  A process where you will review visual content and label specific characteristics that make it stand out from other subjects or types of content  With enough prepared samples the algorithm will then have the necessary amount of comparable material to start recognising this subject on its own   Along the labelling aspect you will also create various collections of visual content and perform edits to the material itself  giving the job more of a focus on photoshop and visual creative content than anything else  These activities will then further help the development of the machine learning algorithm to be able to supply the relevant content the users are looking for on their platform  day after day   What do we need from you   As the new Data Labelling Specialist that will work as part of the Big 4 in consulting for one of the most prominent Social Media platforms on the planet  Location  Amsterdam   we need the following from you  Experience with any sort of image editing software  such as Photoshop No prior fulltime working experience required Strong communicative capabilities are required You are currently living near the area of Amsterdam What will you get in return  Salary between  2 450 and  2 600 per month A  1 500 sign on bonus  Excellent career development opportunities Is this going to be your next job   Take the step and let us hear from you  Apply immediately via the application button below  send your CV and motivation to m vanrosmalen hotmail com or give us a call at  31 20 8200 676   For all of our other vacancies regarding Digital Marketing in Amsterdam  be sure to check out our website  https   www finestpeople nl en jobs

This is Adyen  Adyen is the payments platform of choice for the world s leading companies  delivering frictionless payments across online  mobile  and in store channels  Our team members are motivated individuals that help each other do remarkable things every day  We face unique technical challenges at scale and we solve those as a team  And together  we deliver innovative and ethical solutions that transform the way the world pays  We took an unobvious approach to starting a payments company  building a platform from scratch  Now  Adyen serves the world s brightest companies like Facebook  Uber  L Oreal  Casper  Bonobos  and Spotify   VP Product   Data  Adyen is looking for a passionate Product VP to massively scale our ability to convert data into value for our customers  Your teams will build and scale our core data generated by the massive volume from our financial services  Our merchants are the fastest growing companies in the world  and we need to stay ahead of their needs as their guide to manage highly regulated  highly sensitive data in a changing world  Your vision will enable every team at Adyen to run experiments  use data to solve problems worth millions  and ensure analytics are accessible and familiar to every Adyener from their first day  This role will be given considerable freedom to develop Adyen s data capabilities  including AI  core data infrastructure  data extraction  and rapid prototyping of datasets  You will create and evangelize a vision for products powered by Adyen s Big Data platform  realize that vision with multiple teams of product managers  designers  data scientists  and engineers  and ensure Adyen merchants gain measurable benefit from your teams  efforts  In this role you will  Listen to our merchants  engineers  and partners to find problems that Adyen is uniquely positioned to solve Become a known thought leader in the industry for financial technology and the use of data Long term strategic vision behind Data engineering Build vs  buy decisions  Open source scouting  External service big data   tooling providers Internal data enablement  Data engineering and architecture  Complexity vs  WIN  application of ML vs  next viable option  ML Scaling and tooling for cross company adoption What you need to succeed  Leadership   you have directly managed teams and you also have significant experience in scaling a data organization in a large  global company as management lead  Integrity   you have earned the trust of your technical and non technical customers and colleagues  from the board level to support level Proven record   you have conceived of launched and scaled multiple products in the big data   machine learning space with quantifiable value Data informed   you can guide data science engineering teams with the right questions to answer  and turn those answers into business value Business acumen   you have identified novel and significant revenue opportunities  and have convinced senior executives to invest in your product strategy Adaptability and creativity   plans and conditions always change  but you still positively navigate the right course Poise   sales asks you to sit with their clients  and marketing asks you to present at conferences  Network   you leverage your own network to hire  influence  validate  and get product adoption   Our Diversity  Equity   Inclusion Commitments  Our unobvious approach is a product of our diverse perspectives  This diversity of backgrounds  cultures  and perspectives is essential in helping us maintain our momentum  Our business and technical challenges are unique  we need as many different voices as possible to join us in solving them   voices like yours  So no matter where you re from  who you love  or what you believe in  we welcome you to be your true self at Adyen   Studies show that women and members of underrepresented communities apply for jobs only if they meet 100  of the qualifications  Do you recognize yourself in this statement  If so  Adyen encourages you to reconsider and apply  We look forward to your application   What is next   Ensuring a smooth and enjoyable candidate experience is critical for us  We aim to get back to you regarding your application within 7 business days  Our interview process tends to take between 3 or 4 weeks to complete  Don t be afraid to let us know if you need more flexibility

ons kantoor in Amsterdam wordt er dankzij jou geen beslissing meer genomen op buikgevoel  maar op basis van analyse en feiten  Met jouw vernieuwende inzichten geef je input voor actuele vraagstukken In today s world  digital connectivity is vital to people and organisations alike  The demand for reliable data exchanging environments is growing rapidly  And the technical challenges involved in this are numerous  You assist organisations in developing innovative data ecosystems through which data can be shared with the right recipients in a carefree  secure  and controlled manner  WHAT WILL BE YOUR ROLE  As part of the relatively new expertise group  Data Ecosystems  you ll work with smart and committed colleagues on challenging projects for industry  logistics  and the domains of defence and security  among others  As a technical consultant  you re the link between TNO and the outside world  In this role  you re the point of contact for SMEs  sector organisations  and universities throughout Europe  You translate scientific knowledge and technologies into concrete solutions and connect people and organisations  Curious to know what TNO is already doing in this area  For an example  have a look at our contribution to the Netherlands AI Coalition for responsible data sharing  in which we re working on a blueprint for information sharing  or the Smart Connected Supplier Network  in which we re working on a large scale solution for SME manufacturing companies to share information in complex supplier chains  What does a day as a consultant look like  Working at TNO means your work stretches beyond daily general affairs  Part of your role will be to assess the potential of new developments together with customers  Additionally  TNO offers a dynamic and varied environment in which every day is unique  You could be representing TNO within an international research project on Monday  sparring with your colleagues about improving a proof of concept on Tuesday  and joining a manufacturing company on the production floor to experience a new innovation up close on Wednesday HOW DO YOU WANT TO CONTRIBUTE TO TOMORROW S WORLD  HOW BIG CAN YOUR IMPACT BE  COME AND WORK AT TNO AND ENVISION IT WHAT WE EXPECT FROM YOU Conducting scientific research while working on relevant practical applications in partnership with clients and other organisations is independently and doing your own research  while at the same time keeping in touch with your colleagues spread throughout the country  even if your immediate colleagues are often to be found in the Eindhoven region   Other knowledge and skills you bring to TNO  A master s degree or work experience in a relevant field  such as computer science  business information systems  business informatics  technical business administration  industrial engineering  or operation research  A deep sense of wonder in relation to the technical side of IT  More than three years of relevant work experience  The drive and potential to develop  further   WHAT YOU LL GET IN RETURN Challenging and varied work with a real impact  And plenty of opportunities as  at TNO  you are in charge of shaping your career  We Job Description DATA SPECIALIST Brandbank   Benelux team   Houten OR Brussels office ABOUT THIS JOB Brandbank  a NielsenIQ company  is one of the world s largest providers of trusted digital product content for eCommerce sites  mobile shopping apps and virtual merchandising applications  With 20 years of experience in eCommerce content  Brandbank maximizes the impact of online products for the FMCG retailers and manufacturers  while minimizing the cost and effort to retailers and suppliers  We create high quality content that fuels eCommerce success for our customers while creating a rich online shopping experience  The BENELUX Data Specialist is the key subject matter expert for our day to day data operation  They apply their knowledge of how our data is captured  stored  transformed  and ultimately used  to resolve issues and drive improvements for our customers  The BENELUX Data Specialist is responsible for the management of the local data model  facilitating the implementation of non strategic business changes  including template creation  translation changes  code list updates  and associated processes  Working in alignment with our Business Development and Global Data teams  the Data Specialist will provide critical support for automation  innovation  and development across the BENELUX markets  RESPONSIBILITIES Management of local data model  including code list updates  and creation and maintenance of any supporting material Support template amendments  including translation and language support  Ownership of Operational relationship with standards organisations  GS1  in the market   working to ensure our relationship is aligned and proactive Actively maintain knowledge of the local GDSN data model and capture rules Delivery of GS1   Global Data Synchronization Network  GDSN  initiatives by supporting operational data capture changes Ensuring data quality is maintained through the transformation from the BrandBank Product Library  GDSN Connector and retailer sites Work with other data governance stakeholders to identify and enact changes to the data model and entry rules to drive quality and coverage of data and maximize the efficiency of the data entry process Involvement in scoping and design of new initiatives e g  dictionaries   validations Creation of  clean  data to drive logic building validations in systems Work with Data Hub team to deliver data analysis projects Coordinate roll out of local process changes to execution teams and providing relevant training material Provide support to customers  understanding their use cases for our data  working to resolve issues  and communicating the benefits of our data  syndication partners  retailers  etc   Management of New Fields  Translation changes and Lookup List changes Work with Legal Data Standards Manager to ensure compliance Work in alignment with Business Development team and PMO to deliver data automation projects Maintain a global view of the business s data strategy and goals  and work towards them REQUIREMENTS Degree level graduate or equivalent experience and knowledge of data processes Effective communicator  verbally and in writing Dutch language is a must  as well as English Good understanding of e commerce data space Passion for learning and keeping up to date with a fast changing area of the industry   ensuring up to date knowledge of eCommerce and Digital content WHAT WE CAN OFFER Work in dynamic environment with global companies from e commerce sector Possibility to grow together with the Brandbank team   NielsenIQ structure Opportunity to have great impact on expansion of the business  including new territories Work in high diverse team  in relax   open atmosphere Benefits   flexible working hours  remote work options Opportunity to become part of a global internal team of GDSN experts and to expand role outside the Benelux region Gradually become independent  a decision maker Interaction with a variety of internal and external stakeholders including clients and service providers Learn about physical and virtual photography and the distribution of digital assets  LI HL1 Additional Information About NielsenIQ NielsenIQ is a global measurement and data analytics company that provides the most complete and trusted view available of consumers and markets worldwide  We provide consumer packaged goods manufacturers fast moving consumer goods and retailers with accurate  actionable information and insights and a complete picture of the complex and changing marketplace that companies need to innovate and grow  Our approach marries proprietary NielsenIQ data with other data sources to help clients around the world understand what s happening now  what s happening next  and how to best act on this knowledge  We like to be in the middle of the action  That s why you can find us at work in over 90 countries  covering more than 90  of the world s population  For more information  visit www niq com  NielsenIQ is committed to hiring and retaining a diverse workforce  We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity Affirmative Action Employer  making decisions without regard to race  color  religion  gender  gender identity or expression  sexual orientation  national origin  genetics  disability status  age  marital status  protected veteran status or any other protected class

This is Adyen  Adyen is the payments platform of choice for the world s leading companies  delivering frictionless payments across online  mobile  and in store channels  Our team members are motivated individuals that help each other do remarkable things every day  We face unique technical challenges at scale and we solve those as a team  And together  we deliver innovative and ethical solutions that transform the way the world pays   We took an unobvious approach to starting a payments company  building a platform from scratch  Now  Adyen serves the world s brightest companies like Facebook  Uber  L Oreal  Casper  Bonobos and Spotify   Compliance Data Analyst  Adyen is looking for a professional  motivated Compliance Data Analyst  who will assist in monitoring Ayden s Compliance Framework  You will be working within the Compliance Data team  to support the wider Compliance area   What you ll do  Gain an in depth understanding of how Adyen processes payments  onboards customers and stores customer KYC data  Identify the necessary data required for regulatory reporting to financial authorities  Work with cross functional teams to find creative solutions to identify compliance gaps  and communicate issues to the relevant individuals and teams  You will understand and learn Ayden s internal policies and procedures  and also gain knowledge of regulation  Who you are Must have experienced working in a Compliance role  particularly in the KYC space Must have experience using Business Intelligence tools such as Looker Power BI Tableau Experience in SQL   Python not necessary but is advantageous Excellent communication skills Proactive with a can do mentality Ability to work both independently and in a diverse team environment You enjoy a fast paced environment You are skilled at prioritizing projects and multitasking Ability to maintain confidentiality Our Diversity  Equity and Inclusion commitments  Our unobvious approach is a product of our diverse perspectives  This diversity of backgrounds  cultures  and perspectives is essential in helping us maintain our momentum  Our business and technical challenges are unique  we need as many different voices as possible to join us in solving them   voices like yours  So no matter where you re from  who you love  or what you believe in  we welcome you to be your true self at Adyen   Studies show that women and members of underrepresented communities apply for jobs only if they meet 100  of the qualifications  Does it sound like you  If so  Adyen encourages you to reconsider and apply  We look forward to your application   What s next   Ensuring a smooth and enjoyable candidate experience is critical for us  We aim to get back to you regarding your application within 3 business days  Our interview process tends to take between 3 or 4 weeks to complete  Don t be afraid to let us know if you need more flexibility   Please  note that this role is a full time position in Amsterdam  It will require a relocation in case you live outside of the Netherlands

Daarom wil je als data consultant bij NS werkenVerdiep je in de railsector en zet je diepgaande data kennis in binnen Nederlands grootste vervoerder  Je levert een belangrijke bijdrage aan de ontwikkeling van NS richting een data gedreven organisatie en de digitale ambitie  Je werkt in een team van zeer gedreven professionals die samen met jou echt het verschil willen maken  Dit ga je doen als data consultant bij NS Als data consultant werk je vanuit het cluster data binnen ComIT  de commerciële afdeling van NS  Vanuit dit cluster hebben we de ambitie om ComIT een meer datagedreven organisatie te maken  Wij geloven dat met data als middel  je in staat bent sneller  beter en efficiënter bedrijfsdoelen kan halen  Het gaat hierbij ook om je intuïtie en buikgevoel te ondersteunen met data zodat je in staat bent de juiste beslissing te nemen  Binnen ons team houden wij ons met vele facetten van data bezig die bijdragen aan deze doelstelling  zoals met datamanagement waarbij we het data eigenaarschap inregelen en teams helpen met het implementeren van datakwaliteit  Vanuit onze datacoach rol werken wij vanuit een nul meting om andere afdelingen binnen ComIT te helpen meer datagedreven te werken  Dit kan zijn door middel van inspireren  datageletterdheid vergroten  een training op maat of bijvoorbeeld praktisch meekijken met het ontwikkelen van een informatieproduct   Hier ga je werken Op de afdeling ComIT op het hoofdkantoor in Utrecht werken commerciële en IT professionals samen in multidisciplinaire teams  Onze mindset is Agile  We zijn ondernemend  zelf organiserend en willen continu blijven leren  ontwikkelen en verbeteren om zo een wendbare werkomgeving te creëren  Alleen zo kunnen we nu en in de toekomst voldoen aan de steeds veranderende behoeftes van onze reizigers  Ons motto  You build it  you own it  you love it  De grootste uitdaging in onze digitale transformatie is het creëren van snelheid  In een groot bedrijf als NS betekent dat iets voor de organisatie  Binnen ComIT is er ruimte om deze snelheid te creëren  Je werkt samen met collega s die stuk voor stuk een proactieve en pragmatische instelling hebben en die eigenaarschap durven te tonen  Kort op de bal en ondernemend  Hier herken jij jezelf in  want  Je bent ambitieus en gedreven om continue te leren en ontwikkelen  Je coacht graag collega s en geeft feedback om hen te helpen elke dag een beetje beter te worden  Je bent ondernemend en denkt in oplossingen  fact based  datagedreven  Als Digital Native wil je met continu innoveren en gebruikerservaringen verbeteren  Klantgericht denken en doen zit in je haarvaten  Dit zijn de functie eisenJe beschikt over hbo werk  en denkniveau  Je hebt aantoonbaar ervaring in de rol van dataconsultancy in een complexe organisatie  daarbij weet je data goed toe te passen in een commerciële omgeving van bron tót gebruik van data  Je bent bekend met verschillende onderdelen dan datagedrevenheid en weet die ook te vertalen naar concrete acties voor afdelingen en teams  Je hebt ervaring met het verbeteren van de datagedrevenheid binnen de organisatie en een organisatie daarin mee te nemen  Je kent gangbare datastandaarden in de markt  Als collega ben je goed in staat om te schakel op verschillende niveaus binnen NS  ook neem je andere collega s graag mee in nieuwe ontwikkelingen en weet goed wat nodig is om deze veranderingen te implementeren  Dit zijn de arbeidsvoorwaarden Werken bij NS betekent dat jij hét verschil kunt maken in de wereld van duurzame mobiliteit  Je maakt deel uit van een organisatie die midden in de maatschappij staat en Nederland in beweging brengt  Maar als 1 van de grootste werkgevers van Nederland hebben we je zoveel meer te bieden  Voor deze functie is dit onder andere  Een salaris tussen   3 633   en   6 210   bruto per maand  schaal 61   o b v  36 urige werkweek   Een 36  urige werkweek  Vijf weken vakantie  180 uur bi 36 urige werkweek   De mogelijkheid om 3 christelijke feestdagen om te ruilen voor 3 niet christelijke feestdagen  3  eindejaarsuitkering  8  vakantietoeslag en een uitstekende pensioenregeling  Je treinreizen in de 2e klas zijn gratis  in de 1e klas reizen kan tegen een kleine eigen bijdrage  Je gezin reist gratis in de daluren  Korting op Europese treinreizen zodra je 1 jaar bij NS werkt  De mogelijkheid tot thuiswerken en flexibele werktijden  in overleg   Professionele ontwikkelingsmogelijkheden Een keuzeplan met o a  fietsenplan  extra pensioenopbouw of extra vakantiedagen  Wil je meer weten  Bekijk dan hier de NS cao  Bij NS vinden we diversiteit en inclusie belangrijk  het maakt samenwerken leuker en het resultaat wordt er ook nog beter van  Wat jouw achtergrond of levensovertuiging is  maakt dan ook niet uit  we zijn vooral benieuwd naar jouw visie op de functie van Data consultant  Solliciteren naar deze baan Solliciteer direct  maar zeker voor maandag 10 april 2022  via de sollicitatiebutton  Binnen enkele minuten ontvang je een automatische sollicitatiebevestiging  binnen 2 weken reageren wij op jouw sollicitatie  Je kunt je sollicitatie richten aan Ruwan de Vries  recruiter  Nog vragen over het sollicitatieproces  Mail met Karin van de frontoffice via recruitment ns nl  Heb je liever telefonisch contact  Kijk dan op onze website voor de actuele telefoonnummers  Vanwege de coronamaatregelen hebben wij onze sollicitatieprocedure aangepast  Lees hier wat je kunt verwachten  Goed om te weten  Een achtergrondonderzoek  met o a  VOG  Verklaring omtrent Gedrag   maakt deel uit van de sollicitatieprocedure  Denk hierbij ook aan het tekenen van een integriteitsverklaring en geheimhoudingsverklaring  We vinden het belangrijk dat iedereen die bij ons werkt zich thuis voelt  Dit zie je in alles wat we doen  en dus ook in ons aannamebeleid  Lees hier meer  Met deze vacature willen wij zelf onze nieuwe collega werven  Dit is dan ook géén oproep voor acquisitie

 For an example  have a look at our contribution to the Netherlands AI Coalition for responsible data sharing  in which we re working on a blueprint for information sharing  or the Smart Connected companies in the world to achieve carbon neutrality and our next sustainability goals are even bolder  doubling our positive impact on the environment and society by 2025  We are looking for an App Data Analytics Practitioner who will be responsible for defining the data strategy for logging and analyzing the app usage to deliver meaningful data driven insights and find improvement opportunities from the massive amount of usage data  You will act as an owner for the data management of Philips Hue Software Applications  What you ll do You ll be working on the following problems daily and drive business decisions with your insights by collaborating with Product Managers and Product Owners  Set  prioritize  and execute the data strategy to drive improvement in logging  analyzing and leveraging App data for measuring success KPIs  diagnostics and consumer insights Own the tracking and managing of the data consumption versus plan and budget with our data providers Act as an owner and promoter for the App data tooling  Supporting implementation  adoption and further development of the tools involved with data insight generation and be involved with supplier discussions  Own the data requirement process in software innovations being the spokesman of the business users towards the engineers Collaborate with stakeholders  supporting them in defining goals  selecting appropriate KPIs  monitoring performance and derive trends and opportunities Build out an audit process to ensure procedures and metrics are in place for continually improving use of app analytics tool Create and execute internal training programs to promote the ethical and appropriate use of App data tooling and assets across the business Create the frameworks and guidelines for the management and usage of the metadata and ensure correct recording Prepares guidelines and templates for App data management processes Your qualifications Master level degree in Business Analytics  Statistics  Data Analytics or related field 2  years  experience with App analytics  data governance and strategy Is proficient at pulling and accessing data from multiple sources  and managing through data ambiguity Experienced with tools like Amplitude  Braze  SAP Analytics Strong communicator and fluent in English  speaking and writing   Ability to communicate the findings and recommendations of analysis in a clear and effective manner at all levels  out of the box  thinker and going the extra mile Passionate about deriving insights from the data recognized team player analytical and data driven mindsetWhat you ll get in return We re offering multiple opportunities for career development  like mentoring  coaching and stretch assignments  with strong international exposure for dynamic profiles  Learning is fundamental to our culture  Through continuous learning  we are transforming the industry  You have the chance to learn every day  acquire new skills and perspectives through customized online programs  and on the job experiences  See  SignifyLife through the eyes of our employees

In het team Data Strategy   Factory ondersteunen wij onze klanten op het data vlak om hun strategische doelen te bereiken  Als  junior  Consultant Data Science maak jij impact bij onze klanten door hen te helpen met het creëren van waarde met data en de laatste technologieën   Jouw job in één alinea  Als  junior  Consultant Data Science duik jij de data in om oplossingen te vinden voor complexe vraagstukken  Dit betekent dat jij met advanced analytics  data science en machine learning onze klanten helpt hun strategische doelen te bereiken  De ene keer ontwikkel je een Proof of Concept van een voorspellend model  de andere keer onderbouw je met harde cijfers uit geavanceerde analyses het adviesrapport naar de klant  In je werk blijf je niet verstopt achter je computer  je zoekt het gesprek met de klant op om erachter te komen wat er nu echt gevraagd wordt  Van data maak je informatie en je weet als geen ander wat data gedreven werken inhoudt  Tot slot is data science een veld in ontwikkeling  Met jouw achtergrond ben je in staat om snel nieuwe technieken en methodologieën eigen te maken en toe te passen  Kortom  je brengt de data science in projecten tot leven  altijd met de klantvraag en context in gedachten   Je thuisbasis bij Capgemini Invent  Het Data Strategy   Factory team van Capgemini Invent bestaat uit een groep enthousiaste data minded management consultants met een passie voor organisatorische vraagstukken  Bij onze oplossingen staat data altijd centraal  We zijn primair gezien consultant en bieden oplossingen waarin data centraal staat  Dit doen we vanuit verschillendee focusgebieden  Wij leveren waarde bij onze klanten door hen te ondersteunen in het gebruiken van data om strategische doelen te behalen  Dat doen we door het ontwikkelen van datastrategieën  het opzetten en implementeren van Data Management capabilities  en het vertalen van business vraagstukken naar dataoplossingen waar wij Data Analytics  BI en Data Science technieken gebruiken om diepgaande en vernieuwende inzichten te genereren  We krijgen uiteenlopende vraagstukken binnen van onze klanten  van het opzetten van een Data Office tot het voorspellen van verkopen  Als team houden we elkaar scherp  delen veelvuldig kennis en staan altijd voor elkaar klaar  Het team is grotendeels zelf organiserend en is bereid om samen nét dat beetje extra te leveren bij de klant  We hebben allemaal een grote passie voor advies en data  maar vinden een fijne sfeer en plezier op de werkvloer  en daarbuiten  ook enorm belangrijk  Onze personeelsvereniging Escape en onze binnen de Enterprise Data Management afdeling  Essentie is het helpen van de PostNL organisatie met kaders voor datamanagement en begeleiding bij de implementatie daarvan   Daarbij ben je dus mede richtinggevend als het gaat om het benutten van het potentieel van de PostNL data en zorg je ervoor dat de bewustwording rondom het belang van kwalitatief hoogwaardige en bruikbare data toeneemt  I s m  je EDM collega s ben je verantwoordelijk voor Het borgen dat data eigenaarschap binnen PostNL ondubbelzinnig is vastgelegd per data domein  Het borgen dat rollen en functies binnen de Data Management Organisaties  DMO s  in de business units  BU s  duidelijk zijn beschreven en dat de invulling hiervan op de juiste manier plaatsvindt  Het begeleiden van de DMO s bij de implementatie van data management  Het samenwerken met de data architecten binnen EDM v w b  de verschillende data modellen  Het inrichten en begeleiden van de implementatie van het Data Quality Management proces PostNL breed  Het vervullen van een ambassadeursrol op het gebied van Data Management  Het uitdragen van de data principes en borgen dat de BU s hier ook naar acteren Je verantwoordelijkhedenWe willen de favoriete bezorger van Nederland zijn door iedere dag weer bijzondere momenten te bezorgen  Daarbij staan onze medewerkers voorop en onze klanten centraal  We zoeken altijd naar manieren om het nóg beter te doen  En daar hebben we jou bij nodig  Jij gaat ervoor zorgen dat we in onze klantinteractie kunnen beschikken over de benodigde data om de klantbeleving zo optimaal mogelijk te laten zijn Wat breng jij mee Jij bent er van overtuigd dat data een strategisch bedrijfsmiddel is en PostNL verder kan brengen in haar digitale transformatie  Afgeronde relevante WO opleiding  bijv Informatica
